Name: xorg
Purpose: open source implementation of X windowing system

Name: arandr
Purpose: is a UI for screen adjustment

Name: neovim
Purpose: an tidier vim with some useful features

Name: ncmpcpp
Purpose: a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.

Name: sc-im
Purpose: is an Excel-like terminal spreadsheet manager.

Name: zathura-djvu
Purpose: gives zathura the ability to read .djvu files.

Name: zathura-pdf-mupdf
Purpose: allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.

Name: pulseaudio-alsa
Purpose: is an audio interface with ALSA.

Name: pulsemixer
Purpose: is an intuitive ncurses audio controller.

Name: networkmanager
Purpose: does exactly what it sounds like.

Name: poppler
Purpose: manipulates .pdfs and gives .pdf previews and other .pdf functions.

Name: atool
Purpose: manages and gives information about archives.

Name: task-spooler
Purpose: queues commands or files for download.

Name: simple-mtpfs
Purpose: enables the mounting of cell phones.
